scripts.prebuild:chrome: echo Clearing old build... & npm run clearprevbuild
scripts.build:chrome: echo Building chrome extension... & cross-env PLATFORM_PATH=platform/chrome npm run copyfiles && npm run commonbuildsteps
scripts.prebuild:firefox: echo Clearing old build... & npm run clearprevbuild
scripts.build:firefox: echo Building firefox extension... & cross-env PLATFORM_PATH=platform/firefox npm run copyfiles && npm run commonbuildsteps
scripts.prebuild:android: echo Clearing old build... & npm run clearprevbuild
scripts.build:android: echo Building Android app... & cross-env PLATFORM_PATH=platform/android npm run copyfiles && npm run commonbuildsteps
scripts.commonbuildsteps: npm run compilecss && npm run bundlecss && npm run minifycryptojs && npm run bundleappscripts
scripts.compilecss: node-sass build/css/bootstrap.scss build/css/bootstrap.css -q & node-sass build/css/font-awesome.scss build/css/font-awesome.css -q & node-sass build/css/fonts.scss build/css/fonts.css -q & node-sass build/css/styles.scss build/css/styles.css -q & node-sass build/css/platform.scss build/css/platform.css -q
scripts.bundlecss: minify build/css/font-awesome.css build/css/bootstrap.css build/css/fonts.css build/css/styles.css build/css/platform.css | n-pipe build/css/styles.min.css
scripts.minifycryptojs: minify node_modules/crypto-js/core.js node_modules/crypto-js/enc-base64.js node_modules/crypto-js/md5.js node_modules/crypto-js/evpkdf.js node_modules/crypto-js/cipher-core.js node_modules/crypto-js/aes.js | n-pipe build/js/crypto-js.min.js
scripts.bundleappscripts: uglifyjs --beautify --output build/js/app-scripts.min.js -- js/global.js js/utility.js js/httpInterceptor.js js/api.js js/bookmarks.js js/platform.js build/js/platformImplementation.js js/app.js build/js/app-initialise.js
scripts.bundlewebextdependencies: uglifyjs --beautify --output build/js/background-scripts.min.js -- js/global.js js/utility.js js/httpInterceptor.js js/api.js js/bookmarks.js js/platform.js build/js/platformImplementation.js build/js/background.js && n-concat node_modules/angular/angular.min.js node_modules/angular-animate/angular-animate.min.js node_modules/angular-complexify/build/angular-complexify.min.js node_modules/angular-sanitize/angular-sanitize.min.js node_modules/ng-infinite-scroll/build/ng-infinite-scroll.min.js node_modules/angular-filter/dist/angular-filter.min.js node_modules/underscore/underscore-min.js build/js/crypto-js.min.js node_modules/lzutf8/build/production/lzutf8.min.js node_modules/base64-js/base64js.min.js node_modules/qrcode-svg/dist/qrcode.min.js node_modules/compare-versions/index.js | n-pipe build/js/app-dependencies.min.js && n-concat node_modules/angular/angular.min.js node_modules/underscore/underscore-min.js build/js/crypto-js.min.js node_modules/lzutf8/build/production/lzutf8.min.js node_modules/base64-js/base64js.min.js node_modules/compare-versions/index.js | n-pipe build/js/background-dependencies.min.js
scripts.webextbuildsteps: npm run bundlewebextdependencies && n-concat build/js/background-dependencies.min.js build/js/background-scripts.min.js | n-pipe build/js/background.min.js && n-concat build/js/app-dependencies.min.js build/js/app-scripts.min.js | n-pipe build/js/app.min.js
scripts.bundlemobiledependencies: n-concat node_modules/angular/angular.min.js node_modules/angular-animate/angular-animate.min.js node_modules/angular-complexify/build/angular-complexify.min.js node_modules/angular-sanitize/angular-sanitize.min.js node_modules/ng-infinite-scroll/build/ng-infinite-scroll.min.js node_modules/angular-filter/dist/angular-filter.min.js node_modules/underscore/underscore-min.js build/js/crypto-js.min.js node_modules/lzutf8/build/production/lzutf8.min.js node_modules/base64-js/base64js.min.js node_modules/hammerjs/hammer.min.js node_modules/angular-hammer/angular.hammer.min.js node_modules/fastclick/lib/fastclick.js node_modules/qrcode-svg/dist/qrcode.min.js node_modules/compare-versions/index.js | n-pipe build/js/app-dependencies.min.js
scripts.androidcordovabuild: echo Building cordova project... & n-copy --source build --destination build/cordova/www --ignore cordova/** "*" "**/*" & n-copy --source build/cordova/InAppBrowser --destination build/cordova/platforms/android/src/org/apache/cordova/inappbrowser InAppBrowser.java && cd build/cordova && cordova build android
scripts.androidbuildsteps: npm run bundlemobiledependencies && n-concat build/js/app-dependencies.min.js build/js/app-scripts.min.js | n-pipe build/js/app.min.js && npm run androidcordovabuild
